It's on the "to do" list -- see the issue tracker for details -- (Work Item 16), but charting isn't yet implemented within PHPExcel.
Is there real alternative to create charts in PHP?
You can create a graph image with jpGraph and include this image in a PHPExcel sheet. Check http://www.aditus.nu/jpgraph/
